name: Từ vựng Tiếng Anh về Áo khoác và áo choàng (Outerwear)

words.example: She wore a light jacket because it was a bit chilly.
He put on his warm coat before going out in the snow.
The detective wore a long overcoat and a fedora.
Don't forget your raincoat; it looks like it's going to pour.

words.vietnamese: áo parka (áo khoác có mũ lông)
words.example: He zipped up his parka to protect himself from the cold wind.
She wore a smart blazer over her dress for the meeting.
He looked cool in his new leather jacket.
